title: 乌克兰军方在斯塔拉·赫塔（Stara Huta）附近与俄罗斯军队和苏米（Sumy）地区的Brusky进行了50次战斗活动，
content: Ukrainian military had 50 combat engagements with Russian forces near Stara Huta and Brusky of Sumy region, Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Ivanivske, Klischiyivka and south to Chasiv Yar of Donetsk region, Berdychi, Tonenke, Pervomayske and Nevelske of Donetsk region, Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, 乌克兰武装部队的武装部队总参谋长在晚间报告中说
author: Live UA Map
